targets.expr: scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="requests.cpu"})
scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="limits.cpu"})
count(kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name, owner_kind)
scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="requests.memory"})
scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="limits.memory"})
count(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type="$type"}) by (workload, workload_type)

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_name=~".+", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_name=~".+", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))

(avg(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(owner_name,owner_kind) kube_pod_owner{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", owner_name=~".+", owner_kind="$type"}) by (owner_name))
